GMF - Chaos Claw.name: GMF - Chaos Claw
GMF - Chaos Claw.description: Example item of Roll for Activity generic feature. Midi Attack activity triggers the Midi Use activity. Midi Use activity will roll a d4, which will trigger the activity with the dice result in its name.

GMF - Bite.name: GMF - Bite
GMF - Bite.description: Example usage of chained Activity on Rest and Reduce Maximum HP generic features. This item has two activities, an attack and a save. The attack activity applied an effect and triggers the Activity on Rest automation, which ties the selected activities to trigger to the effect. On a valid rest, the save activity will be triggered and the Reduce Maximum HP automation will apply. These will continue until a successful save.
